name: Git Warehouse - Alpha DEMO
description:
Demo of the first half of QFK: Git Warehouse a game that teaches the player

the fundamental commands required to use the Git version control system.

Learn the Git workflow step-by-step as you manage inventory in the warehouse.

Each concept and command is explained in the in-game manual.

Select Git commands to manipulate inventory items.

View example output based on real Git Bash console output.

Play the included arcade mini-game, Cyberbyke Run.
